alsamixer -- Make sure everything is tog: when using hdmi there was loud pops and really weird sound coming out of the speakers in both 9.04 and 9.10 when using hdmi out.  I stopped using hdmi out in 9.04 and moved to just regular jack.  Installed 9.10 and there was a horrid squeel coming out of the speakers and regardless of what was muted or on it didnt change.
the fix was to comment out options snd-hda-intel power_save=10 in /etc/modprobe.d/alsa-base.conf; reboot; done
